desc.cn: Doctoolchain 是一个开源项目，致力于自动创建技术文档
desc.en: docToolchain is an open source project dedicated to automating the creation of technical documentation

/curl.cmd:
curl -Lo dtcw https://doctoolchain.org/dtcw \
&& chmod +x dtcw \
&& ./dtcw install doctoolchain

/wget.cmd:
wget doctoolchain.org/dtcw \
&& chmod +x dtcw \
&& ./dtcw install doctoolchain
